author: Sophie Dahl
method: Melt the butter in a saucepan over a medium heat. Stir in the brown sugar and milk, and bring to the boil for 2-3 minutes, without stirring. Remove from the heat, and stir in the peanut butter and vanilla seeds.  Place the icing sugar in a large bowl, and pour the hot butter and sugar mixture on top. Using a wooden spoon, beat the mixture until smooth. Pour into a 20cm/8in square baking tray, and set aside to cool slightly, then place in the fridge to chill completely. Cut the fudge into squares with a sharp knife, turn out of the tin and store in an airtight container.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz butter ,  500g/1lb 2oz dark brown sugar ,  120ml/4fl oz milk ,  250g/9oz crunchy peanut butter ,  1 vanilla pod, seeds only ,  300g/10½oz icing sugar
